entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:56 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -21.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
